languages.text: К пикам, окружающим лагерь, грубой веревкой привязаны лезвия позолоченных церемониальных клинков.
Gilded ceremonial blades are tied with rough ropes to the spikes surrounding the encampment.
languages.original_text: К пикам, окружающим лагерь, грубой веревкой привязаны лезвия позолоченных церемониальных клинков.

languages.text: Unas dagas ceremoniales doradas están atadas con cuerdas toscas a las estacas que rodean el campamento.
languages.original_text: Gilded ceremonial blades are tied with rough ropes to the spikes surrounding the encampment.

traits.locale_text: Unas dagas ceremoniales doradas están atadas con cuerdas toscas a las estacas que rodean el campamento.

languages.text: 镀金的仪式利刃用粗绳捆在营地周围的尖刺上。
languages.original_text: Gilded ceremonial blades are tied with rough ropes to the spikes surrounding the encampment.

traits.locale_text: 镀金的仪式利刃用粗绳捆在营地周围的尖刺上。

languages.text: 金色の儀式用ブレードが、野営地を囲む忍び返しに粗末なロープで縛られている。
languages.original_text: Gilded ceremonial blades are tied with rough ropes to the spikes surrounding the encampment.

traits.locale_text: 金色の儀式用ブレードが、野営地を囲む忍び返しに粗末なロープで縛られている。

languages.text: Vergoldete Zeremonienklingen wurden mit Seilen an den Spießen befestigt, die das Lager umgeben.
languages.original_text: Gilded ceremonial blades are tied with rough ropes to the spikes surrounding the encampment.

traits.locale_text: Vergoldete Zeremonienklingen wurden mit Seilen an den Spießen befestigt, die das Lager umgeben.

languages.text: Des lames cérémonielles dorées sont attachées aux piques qui délimitent le périmètre du camp au moyen de cordages rudimentaires.
languages.original_text: Gilded ceremonial blades are tied with rough ropes to the spikes surrounding the encampment.

traits.locale_text: Des lames cérémonielles dorées sont attachées aux piques qui délimitent le périmètre du camp au moyen de cordages rudimentaires.

languages.text: Yaldızlı tören palaları, kampı çevreleyen kazıklara sert iplerle bağlanmış.
languages.original_text: Gilded ceremonial blades are tied with rough ropes to the spikes surrounding the encampment.

traits.locale_text: Yaldızlı tören palaları, kampı çevreleyen kazıklara sert iplerle bağlanmış.
